snippet: Texas legislators tell voters they are collecting taxes for specific programs like trauma care, but then use some of the money to balance the budget.
lead_paragraph: Texas legislators tell voters they are collecting taxes for specific programs like trauma care, but then use some of the money to balance the budget.

headline.seo: Texas Uses Taxes for Specific Programs to Fill Budget Gaps
headline.main: Diverting Your Dollars From the Purpose They’re Meant to Serve
headline.print_headline: Diverting Your Dollars From the Purpose They’re Meant to Serve
